identified_features.reasoning: Two through holes on the top surface.
A step is present at the base of the part.
Three circular pockets are present around the edges and one near the center.
A chamfer is visible on the edge of the base.
Three fillets are present, two on the sides and one on the bottom edge.
Two bosses are present, one near the center and another on the left side.
One freeform feature is present on the right side.
